channel.title: machine-learning on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in machine-learning on Notes

item.title: NLP with Python
item.description: Introduction This is an attempt to compile different sources of informations about Natural Language processing with python. Techiniques used in NLP Tokenization Converts text into segments (n-grams) that could represent a word, two words or more.

item.title: Text processing with spaCy
item.description: Introduction spaCy is a library for Natural Language Processing (NLP) in python. It offers multiple solutions for text processing such as tokenization, named entity recognition, word vectors, part of speech tagging.
